==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->

===Personality===
Grandmaster Hanakado is deeply passionate about beetle-fighting. Much like [[Arataki Itto]], he has an extravagant and unique way of speaking, giving [[Paimon]] the impression that he was born to be Itto's arch-nemesis.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Almighty Arataki Extraordinary and Exhilarating Extreme Beetle Brawl!}}</ref> Despite his pride and confidence in his beetle-fighting abilities, Hanakado is still willing to embrace and learn from a worthy opponent.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Beetle Battles Will Never End!}}</ref>

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Grandmaster Hanakado is a young boy with maroon colored hair and dark gray eyes. He wears a striped blue shirt with darker blue shorts and a pointed straw hat.
